title: ESPN analyst Richard Jefferson
description:
ESPN NBA analyst Richard Jefferson joins The Woj Pod to breakdown the opening weekend of the playoffs, including Nets-Celtics, Timberwolves-Grizzlies, an ode to the Cavaliers' season, and much, much more. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
